subject: Baseball
Hormones
lead_paragraph: As the Indians prepared to oppose the Red Sox in Game 7 of the American League Championship Series, Paul Byrd said he had used H.G.H. to treat a tumor on his pituitary gland.
snippet: As the Indians prepared to oppose the Red Sox in Game 7 of the American League Championship Series, Paul Byrd said he had used H.G.H. to treat a tumor on his pituitary gland.
